# 2.1 Information Storage

## Practice Problem 2.1

A. 0x25B9D2

2 = 0010
D = 1101
9 = 1001
B = 1011
5 = 0101
2 = 0010

0010 0101 1011 1001 1101 0010

001001011011100111010010

B. 1010111001001001

1010 1110 0100 1001

1001 = 9
0100 = 4
1110 = E
1010 = A

0xAE49

C. 0xA8B3D

A = 1010
8 = 1000
B = 1011
3 = 0011
D = 1101

1101 0011 1011 1000 1010 

11010011101110001010 

D. 1100100010110110010110

0011 = 3
0010 = 2
0010 = 2
1101 = D
1001 = 9
0110 = 6

0x322D96

## Practice Problem 2.2

| n | 2^n (decimal) | 2^n (hexadecimal) |
| --- | --- | --- |
| 5 | 32 | 0x20 |
| 23 | 8.388.608 | 0x800000 |
| 15 | 32.768 | 0x4000 |
| 14 | 16.384 | 0x2000 |
| 12 | 4.096 | 0x1000 |
| 6 | 64 | 0x40 |
| 8 | 256 | 0x100 |
